term.title: semiconductor-metal transition

item.text: Any transition from a semiconductor to a metallic state under the influence of a temperature or pressure change or both. Examples: Ti2O3: band-edge crossing in a semiconductor to semimetal transition. SmS: localized level crossing a band edge. In SmS hydrostatic pressure above the critical pressureP c ≈ 0.65 GPa broadens the Sm-5d band to make the band edge cross the Sm-4f6 level. A localized-itinerant transition. A switching transition.
